name: Ninja Hagakure
description:
It's different from other survival games
Simple but diverse
Various ninja techniques, various situations, various enemies
Become a ninja and defeat the enemy
20 minutes will feel short

Story

"Ninja Hagakure" This is a guidebook for ninjas.
Players become a ninja and defeat enemies using 40 different ninja skills used by ninjas.
Each stage has to endure various enemies and kings for 20 minutes.

FEATURES

It's not just a dodge and hold game The controls are simple, but the gameplay isn't simple It's a more focused game by choosing, aiming and using your own ninja skills.
There are 40 different ninja skills. Each skill has its own characteristics and you need to use the ninja skill that suits the situation to survive.
In "Ninja Hagakure", not only ninja skills, but also enemies have various skills. Quickly select a skill that suits the situation and defeat it.
It's a simple game, but it's fun with different situations, different skills, and different enemies.

Operation

You have to manipulate, select, aim, and use it yourself, but it's simple
Movement - "W,A,S,D"
Basic Citation - "Left Mouse Button"
Ninja Skills - "Right Click"
Knife - "middle mouse button"
Reload - "R"
